featureCarouselTile.heading: Fitness
featureCarouselTile.copy: Take advantage of our bright, exclusive, fully-equipped fitness centre just a few steps out your door.

featureCarouselTile.heading: Wifi Bar
featureCarouselTile.copy: Your guests will be treated to luxurious furnishings in one of our two seating areas and entertained by TV and a Wi-Fi bar.

featureCarouselTile.heading: Hotel Suite
featureCarouselTile.copy: Each suite has a fridge, stove, dishwasher, window coverings, a large balcony or patio, and in-suite storage.
